lore: Born from the sting of a mindwyrm familiar, the Abominant is an Aberrant tainted with the Patriarchâ€™s own gene-mass. This transforms the beast into a mountain of mutated chitin and muscle that can regenerate as swiftly as its foes can harm it, and whose raw might is a lethal battlefield asset.

faction: The Chosen One: While this model is leading a unit
melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.Regenerating Gene-mass: The first time this model is destroyed
roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+
set this model back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units
